name: apple-mcp_contacts
description: Search and retrieve contacts from Apple Contacts app

name.description: Name to search for (optional - if not provided, returns all contacts). Can be partial name to search.

name: apple-mcp_notes
description: Search, retrieve and create notes in Apple Notes app

searchText.description: Text to search for in notes (required for search operation)

title.description: Title of the note to create (required for create operation)

body.description: Content of the note to create (required for create operation)

folderName.description: Name of the folder to create the note in (optional for create operation, defaults to 'Claude')

name: apple-mcp_messages
description: Interact with Apple Messages app - send, read, schedule messages and check unread messages

phoneNumber.description: Phone number to send message to (required for send, read, and schedule operations)

message.description: Message to send (required for send and schedule operations)

limit.description: Number of messages to read (optional, for read and unread operations)

scheduledTime.description: ISO string of when to send the message (required for schedule operation)

name: apple-mcp_mail
description: Interact with Apple Mail app - read unread emails, search emails, and send emails

account.description: Email account to use (optional - if not provided, searches across all accounts)

mailbox.description: Mailbox to use (optional - if not provided, uses inbox or searches across all mailboxes)

limit.description: Number of emails to retrieve (optional, for unread and search operations)

searchTerm.description: Text to search for in emails (required for search operation)

to.description: Recipient email address (required for send operation)

body.description: Email body content (required for send operation)

cc.description: CC email address (optional for send operation)

bcc.description: BCC email address (optional for send operation)

name: apple-mcp_reminders
description: Search, create, and open reminders in Apple Reminders app

searchText.description: Text to search for in reminders (required for search and open operations)

name.description: Name of the reminder to create (required for create operation)

listName.description: Name of the list to create the reminder in (optional for create operation)

listId.description: ID of the list to get reminders from (required for listById operation)

props.description: Properties to include in the reminders (optional for listById operation)

notes.description: Additional notes for the reminder (optional for create operation)

dueDate.description: Due date for the reminder in ISO format (optional for create operation)

name: apple-mcp_webSearch
description: Search the web using DuckDuckGo and retrieve content from search results

name: apple-mcp_calendar
description: Search, create, and open calendar events in Apple Calendar app

searchText.description: Text to search for in event titles, locations, and notes (required for search operation)

eventId.description: ID of the event to open (required for open operation)

limit.description: Number of events to retrieve (optional, default 10)

fromDate.description: Start date for search range in ISO format (optional, default is today)

toDate.description: End date for search range in ISO format (optional, default is 30 days from now for search, 7 days for list)

title.description: Title of the event to create (required for create operation)

startDate.description: Start date/time of the event in ISO format (required for create operation)

endDate.description: End date/time of the event in ISO format (required for create operation)

location.description: Location of the event (optional for create operation)

notes.description: Additional notes for the event (optional for create operation)

isAllDay.description: Whether the event is an all-day event (optional for create operation, default is false)

calendarName.description: Name of the calendar to create the event in (optional for create operation, uses default calendar if not specified)

name: apple-mcp_maps
description: Search locations, manage guides, save favorites, and get directions using Apple Maps

query.description: Search query for locations (required for search)

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (optional for search)

name.description: Name of the location (required for save and pin)

address.description: Address of the location (required for save, pin, addToGuide)

fromAddress.description: Starting address for directions (required for directions)

toAddress.description: Destination address for directions (required for directions)

transportType.description: Type of transport to use (optional for directions)

guideName.description: Name of the guide (required for createGuide and addToGuide)
